name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia

owner.name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia (Owner)

address: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia, 2706 Main St, Vancouver, BC V5T 3E8

featured_reviews.review_id: This is the best laundry service experience ever. The receptionist was really helpful. She was very straightforward and made everything so easy. I didn't have Canadian cash and was unable to get cash from all those ATM machine. Fortunately they also accept U.S dollars and made the process so easy. Price was reasonable. I only spent $6 for both washing and drying. They don't have seats inside and the store is kinda small, but their service is too notch.
featured_reviews.review_text: This is the best laundry service experience ever. The receptionist was really helpful. She was very straightforward and made everything so easy. I didn't have Canadian cash and was unable to get cash from all those ATM machine. Fortunately they also accept U.S dollars and made the process so easy. Price was reasonable. I only spent $6 for both washing and drying. They don't have seats inside and the store is kinda small, but their service is too notch.

featured_reviews.review_id: I use this laundromat for bedding and other things that my home machines cannot do, and there are always machines available at a great price. The couple who owns the business are always ready to offer advice on which machine to use and which setting for various types of clothing / bedding. Much better than other laundry options in the neighbourhood IMO.
featured_reviews.review_text: I use this laundromat for bedding and other things that my home machines cannot do, and there are always machines available at a great price. The couple who owns the business are always ready to offer advice on which machine to use and which setting for various types of clothing / bedding. Much better than other laundry options in the neighbourhood IMO.

featured_reviews.review_id: We did our laundry here this morning.  Unbelievable customer service.  They couldn't do enough to help us, even telling us which machines to use and providing the right coins.  It is the cheapest laundry I have ever used in all our travels throughout North America and Europe.  Total of $5.00 wash and dry and total of 1 hour.  Highly recommended. Thank you

featured_reviews.review_id: I used their pickup/wash/delivery service yesterday and had a great experience. The price was fair, the person I talked to on the phone was friendly and helpful, and they also got a huge stain out of some of my stuff... Can't recommend enough :)
featured_reviews.review_text: I used their pickup/wash/delivery service yesterday and had a great experience. The price was fair, the person I talked to on the phone was friendly and helpful, and they also got a huge stain out of some of my stuff... Can't recommend enough :)

featured_reviews.review_id: Dropped off laundry - friendly prompt service. Laundry sorted and folded and ready for pickup on proposed date. Recommended.
featured_reviews.review_text: Dropped off laundry - friendly prompt service. Laundry sorted and folded and ready for pickup on proposed date. Recommended.

featured_reviews.review_id: Really friendly and patient staff. Only downside is parking is hard to get by. There's parking behind the laundromat but it was hard for my camper van to get in because of cars parked on the other side of the narrow street. I parked in front of the store with the parking meter.
featured_reviews.review_text: Really friendly and patient staff. Only downside is parking is hard to get by. There's parking behind the laundromat but it was hard for my camper van to get in because of cars parked on the other side of the narrow street. I parked in front of the store with the parking meter.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Great laundromat!
The owners are so friendly and nice!
Sadly there are hardly any laundromats left in Vancouver, and I hope they stay in business for many more years!
I get a family run business vibe, they are hard workers and they are always busy doing tons of drop off orders but I've never had an issue with needing a machine when I come in, have never had to wait even at busy times.
They run their business very efficiently and don't put up with shenanigans.
Everything takes loonies or quarters, but they will give you change at the till.
Largest washing machines are $7/load, and the dryers are very fast. Usually a big load will dry in 30 minutes and cost $2.50 ish.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I really appreciate the nice woman greeting me and then showing me how everything works!

It's funny, I never realized how much little things like this matter until I've gotten older.

THANK YOU!! Going to new places can be unnecessarily scary - your approach is greatly appreciated
